patterns: How can I apply to FAST University?
What is the application process for FAST University?
I want to apply to FAST University. Can you guide me?
How do I submit my application to FAST University?
Can you provide information on the admission procedure for FAST University?
responses: To apply to FAST University, you need to create an account on our website and follow the step-by-step guidelines provided there.
The application process for FAST University involves creating an account on our website, submitting the required documents, and following the instructions provided in the application portal.
Sure! I can help you with your application to FAST University. First, create an account on our website, and then you can follow the instructions to complete your application.
To apply to FAST University, you should visit our official website and create an account. From there, you will find all the necessary information and steps to submit your application.
Applying to FAST University is easy! Just go to our website, create an account, and carefully follow the instructions provided to complete your application.

patterns: What undergraduate programs are available at FAST University?
Tell me about the programs offered at FAST University.
Can you provide information on the programs at FAST University?
Which programs can I pursue at FAST University?
responses: FAST University offers a wide range of undergraduate programs, including Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Business Administration, and more. You can find detailed information about each program on our website.

At FAST University, we offer various undergraduate programs such as Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Business Administration, and more. Each program has its own unique curriculum and opportunities for students to excel.

FAST University provides a diverse selection of undergraduate programs. Some of our offerings include Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Business Administration, and more. You can explore each program's details on our website.

We have a variety of undergraduate programs available at FAST University, including Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Business Administration, and others. Each program is designed to provide students with a strong foundation in their chosen field.

patterns: Does FAST University offer any financial aid or scholarships?
What types of financial aid are available at FAST University?
Can you provide information on financial assistance at FAST University?
How can I apply for financial aid or scholarships at FAST University?
responses: FAST University offers financial aid in the form of scholarships and need-based assistance. You can find detailed information on the available financial aid options and the application process on our website.

We understand the importance of financial support for students. FAST University provides various financial aid options, including scholarships and need-based assistance. You can visit our website to learn more about the eligibility criteria and application process.

Yes, FAST University offers financial aid options to eligible students. We have scholarships and need-based assistance programs in place. To apply for financial aid, please visit our website for detailed information and application instructions.

Financial aid opportunities are available at FAST University, including scholarships and need-based assistance. To apply for financial aid or scholarships, please visit our website and navigate to the financial aid section, where you will find all the necessary information and application guidelines.

patterns: What is the tuition
How much does it cost to attend
Can you tell me about the fees
What is the cost of tuition at FAST Faisalabad?
How much do I need to pay for attending your university?
Can you provide information about the fees and expenses?
responses: Tuition fee is calculated on tha basis of Credit Hours, currently one credit hour cost 8500-/ PKR. Typically tuition fee for one semester ranges from 140k-150K -/ PKR.

The tuition fee at FAST Faisalabad is determined based on the number of credit hours. Currently, the cost per credit hour is 8,500 PKR. For a typical semester, the tuition fee ranges from 140,000 to 150,000 PKR. Detailed information about the fees and expenses can be found on our website or by contacting the university's finance department.

FAST Faisalabad offers a transparent fee structure. The tuition fee is calculated per credit hour, with each credit hour costing 8,500 PKR. The total tuition fee for a semester depends on the number of credit hours you are enrolled in. Additionally, there might be other fees and expenses associated with specific programs or services. For a detailed breakdown, please refer to our website or get in touch with the finance department.

responses: We have a vibrant campus life at FAST, where students are provided with an opportunity to learn, grow and groom themselves both academically and professionally.

responses: The admission requirements vary depending on the program you are applying to. Generally, you will need to submit FSC Result Card, test scores, and other materials. You can find more information by creating an account on FAST Admission Portal.

responses: Yes, we welcome international students. The admission requirements for international students vary depending on the program you are applying to. You can find more information on our website or by contacting the admissions office.

patterns: What is the procedure to get admission in FAST?

responses: First, you have to apply through the website. After that, you have to set preferences and make your merit for the desired program. Then you can submit the fee and get an admission.

patterns: What programs are offered in FAST?
Can you provide a list of available programs at FAST?
Are there any specialized programs or majors?
Are there any dual degree programs available?
responses: A variety of programs are offered at FAST such as BS Computer Sciences, BS Electrical Engineering, BS Software Engineering, Bachelors in Business Administration. For more information, refer to the FAST Prospectus.

patterns: How is the merit of BS CS calculated in FAST?
What factors are considered in the merit calculation for BS CS?
Is the admission test the sole basis for the merit calculation?
responses: The merit of BS CS is calculated 50% on the basis of the FAST Admission Test and 50% on the basis of your FSC result.

patterns: What is the schedule of admissions in FAST?
When do the admissions for FAST start?
Are there any specific dates for application submission and admission tests?
responses: The admissions start in May and are open till the end of June. For exact dates, visit our website.

patterns: How to apply in FAST?
What is the application process for FAST?
Is there an online application form available?
responses: Create an account on our website, fill out the details, and submit the application fee. Then, you have to pass the admission test.

patterns: Can I get a scholarship in FAST?
Are there any scholarships available for students at FAST?
What are the eligibility criteria for scholarships?
responses: Yes, you can get a scholarship in FAST. FAST provides multiple scholarships to its students. Moreover, you can also apply for financial assistance. For more information, contact our campus representative.

patterns: What is the test pattern of the admission test in FAST?
How many sections are there in the admission test?
Which subjects are included in the admission test?
responses: The admission test contains questions from Mathematics, Physics, Analytical Skills, and English. Each portion has a specific weightage.

patterns: What is the fee structure in FAST?
How much is the tuition fee?
Are there any additional fees besides tuition?
Can I pay the fees in installments?
Are there any discounts available for early payment?
responses: The fee is calculated in terms of Credit Hour. The fee for the first semester ranges from 150K-200K, depending upon your credit hours, admission processing fee, and other variables.

patterns: What courses will I study in FAST?
Can you provide a course list for the program I'm interested in?
Are there any core courses that all students are required to take?
responses: You will study different courses over the span of 4 years, depending upon the program you choose.

patterns: Is Hostel Facility available in FAST?
Are there hostels for students at FAST?
Can I stay in a hostel while studying at FAST?
responses: Currently, on-campus hostel facility is only available at FAST-Chiniot Faisalabad Campus.

patterns: How do I get a room in FAST Hostel?
What is the process to book a room in FAST Hostel?
Are there any requirements to get a room in FAST Hostel?
responses: You can get a form for accommodations from FAST Faisalabad Hostel office. Fill it out and submit the fee. You will be accommodated in the hostel.

patterns: How can I change my room in the hostel?
Is it possible to switch rooms in the hostel?
responses: You can change your room by submitting an application to the hostel supervisor's office.

patterns: Is room for luggage provided in the hostel?
Are there storage facilities for luggage in the hostel?
responses: Yes, a closet will be provided in the room for your luggage.

patterns: Is a Mosque available in the hostel?
Are there prayer facilities in the hostel?
responses: Yes, there is a mosque situated in the hostel as well as on the campus.

patterns: What are the dues for Hostel?
What is the fee for the hostel?
What are the charges for a hostel room?
responses: The dues for the hostel currently for a shared room in the boys' hostel are 41,000 PKR, for a single room 55,000 PKR, and for a double room 48,000 PKR. You may need to submit hostel security fee and mess security fee if you're getting a room for the first time, which are 8,000 PKR and 7,000 PKR, respectively.

patterns: Can I change my program during the degree?
Is it possible to switch programs after enrollment?
What is the process for changing my program?
responses: Yes, it may be permissible under most circumstances for a specific time limit. For exact details, you should contact the academic office.

patterns: Can I transfer my degree from any campus to Fast Faisalabad?
Is it possible to transfer my program to Fast Faisalabad campus?
Are there any requirements for transferring my degree?
responses: Yes, you can transfer your program from any other campus of FAST to FAST Faisalabad after completing the requirements.

patterns: How many credit hours are there in a BS Program?
What is the total number of credit hours for a BS degree?
Are there any credit hour requirements for graduation?
responses: There are a total of 130 credit hours required for an undergraduate degree program.

patterns: What is the cost of 1 credit hour?
How much does each credit hour cost?
Is there a specific fee for each credit hour?
responses: The tentative tuition fee per credit hour is 8,500 PKR for the academic year 2021-2022.

patterns: What is the admission fee?
How much do I need to pay as an admission fee?
responses: The admission fee of Rs 20,000 is payable once at the time of admission.

patterns: What is the security fee?
Do I need to pay any security deposit?
responses: A refundable security deposit of Rs 20,000 is also payable at the time of admission.

patterns: Is there any withholding tax on the fee?
Do I need to pay withholding tax for the tuition fee?
responses: The university shall collect advance tax from a person not appearing on the active taxpayers list (ATL) at 5% on the entire amount of fee paid, provided that the annual fee paid exceeds Rs. 200,000.

patterns: What is the fee refund policy of FAST?
Can I get a refund for my tuition fee if I withdraw?
responses: Tuition Fee is refunded in accordance with the guidelines of Higher Education Commission (HEC).

patterns: Is the admission fee refundable?
Can I get a refund for the admission fee?
responses: No, the admission fee is not refundable.

patterns: How can I pay my tuition fee at FAST?
What are the payment options for tuition fee?
responses: You can pay your tuition fee at any branch of Faysal Bank. Moreover, you can also pay through QuickPay. For more details, visit the fee section in Flex.

patterns: How can I lodge my complaint if anything goes wrong?
What should I do if I have a complaint?
Where can I report a problem or issue?
Is there a complaint procedure in place?
responses: There is a complaint management system in place at FAST Faisalabad. Moreover, you can also email your complaint to the relevant authorities.

patterns: How many meals are served in the hostel?
What is the meal schedule in the hostel?
When are the meals served in the hostel?
responses: Three meals are served in the mess regularly: breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

patterns: What is the cost of a meal in the hostel?
How much do the hostel meals cost?
Are the hostel meals included in the fees?
responses: The cost of meals varies according to the meal being served.

patterns: What type of rooms are available in FAST?
Are there different types of rooms in the hostel?
Tell me about the accommodation options at FAST.
responses: For Boys: Single, Double, and Shared Rooms are available in the hostel. For Girls: Shared Rooms are available in the hostel.

patterns: How many students are there in a shared room?
What is the occupancy of a shared room?
responses: There are a total of 6 students in a shared room.

patterns: What are the dues of a single-person room?
What is the cost of a single-person room?
How much does a single room in the hostel cost?
responses: The dues of a single room are 55,000 PKR.

patterns: What are the dues for a shared room?
What is the cost of a shared room?
How much does a shared room in the hostel cost?
responses: The dues of a shared room are 41,000 PKR.

patterns: What is the process to change FAST Campus?
Can I transfer to a different FAST campus?
How can I switch to another FAST campus?
responses: You can change the campus by appearing on the merit of your desired campus and program upon retaking the Fast admission test.

patterns: Are credits transferred when I change a campus?
Can I transfer my credits to another campus?
Will my previous credits be recognized if I change the campus?
responses: Yes, the credits are transferred when you change a campus.

patterns: Are there any sports facilities available on campus?

Can I participate in sports activities at FAST?
responses: Yes, there are a lot of sports facilities available in FAST Faisalabad, including table tennis, cricket, football, futsal, and badminton.

patterns: Is there a gym in FAST Faisalabad Hostel?

Can I work out in the hostel?
responses: Yes, there is a gym available in the hostel. You can get the membership once you are allocated a room in the hostel.

patterns: How big is the Faisalabad Campus of FAST?
Tell me about the size of the campus in Faisalabad.
How much area does the Faisalabad Campus cover?
responses: FAST Faisalabad is a big campus comprising almost 30 acres of land.

patterns: Where is FAST Faisalabad located?
Tell me the address of FAST Faisalabad.
What is the location of FAST in Faisalabad?
responses: FAST Faisalabad is located at Sargodha Road, 10km from the Motorway Interchange at Loonaywala Stop.

patterns: Is there a night cafe in FAST Faisalabad hostel?

Can I get food during late hours in the hostel?
responses: Yes, there is a night café (Dhaba) available at FAST Faisalabad.

patterns: Is it tough to get a degree from FAST?

responses: It's certainly challenging, but if you're determined, then you'll get all the help you need.

patterns: What is the duration of BS Programs in FAST?

responses: The duration of the BS Program is 4 years, which consists of 8 semesters.

patterns: What is the duration of MS Program in FAST?

responses: The duration of MS Programs is 2 years as mandated by the HEC.

patterns: Are modern labs available at FAST?

How much do I have to pay for the hostel room?
Tell me about the charges for staying in the hostel.
responses: The dues for the hostel currently for a shared room in boys hostel are 41000-/ PKR, for a single room 55000-/ PKR, and for a double room 48000-/ PKR. You may need to submit hostel security fee and mess security fee if you're getting a room for the first time, which are 8000-/ and 7000-/ respectively.

patterns: How many meals are served in the hostel?
Tell me about the meal services in the hostel.
What is the meal plan in the hostel?
responses: 3 meals are served in the mess regularly: Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner.

patterns: What is the cost of meals in the hostel?
How much do I have to pay for the meals in the hostel?
Tell me about the charges for the hostel meals.
responses: The cost of meals varies according to the meal being served.

patterns: What types of rooms are available in FAST?
Tell me about the different room options in FAST Hostel.
What are the types of accommodations in the hostel?
responses: For Boys: Single, Double, and Shared Rooms are available in the hostel. For Girls: Shared Rooms are available in the hostel.

patterns: How many students are there in a shared room?
Tell me about the occupancy of a shared room in the hostel.
How many students share a room in the hostel?
responses: There are a total of 6 students in a shared room.

patterns: What are the dues of a single person room?
How much do I have to pay for a single room?
Tell me about the charges for staying in a single person room.
responses: The dues for a single room are 55000 -/ PKR.

patterns: What are the dues for a shared room?
How much do I have to pay for a shared room?
Tell me about the charges for staying in a shared room.
responses: The dues for a shared room are 41000-/ PKR.

patterns: What is the process to change FAST Campus?
How can I transfer to a different campus in FAST?
Tell me about the procedure for changing the FAST Campus.
responses: You can change the campus by appearing on the merit of your desired campus and program upon retaking the Fast admission test.

patterns: Are credits transferred when I change a campus?
Can I transfer my credits to a different campus in FAST?
Tell me about the credit transfer policy in FAST.
responses: Yes, the credits are transferred when you change a campus.

patterns: Are there any sports facilities available on campus?
Tell me about the sports facilities in FAST.
What sports activities are offered in FAST?
responses: Yes, there are a lot of sports facilities available in FAST Faisalabad, including table tennis, cricket, football, futsal, and badminton.

patterns: Is there a gym in Fast Faisalabad Hostel?
Tell me about the gym facilities in FAST Hostel.
Can I access a gym while staying in FAST Hostel?
responses: Yes, there is a gym available in the hostel. You can get a membership once you are allocated a room in the hostel.

patterns: How big is the Faisalabad Campus of Fast?
Tell me about the size of FAST Faisalabad Campus.
What is the area of FAST Faisalabad Campus?
responses: FAST Faisalabad is a big campus comprising almost 30 acres of land.

patterns: Where is FAST Faisalabad located?
Tell me about the location of FAST Faisalabad Campus.
What is the address of FAST Faisalabad?
responses: FAST Faisalabad is located at Sargodha Road, 10 km from the Motorway Interchange at Loonaywala Stop.

patterns: What is the selection criteria for Bachelors?
responses: Selection Crieria for Bachelors is as follows:- 50% weight to higher percent score of SSC (or an equivalent exam) OR HSSC (or an equivalent exam) and 50% weight to marks obtained in Admission Test.

patterns: What is the selection criteria for Masters?
responses: Selection Criteria of Master is as follows:- Past Academic Record (Bachelor): 50% and Performance in NU subject Admission Test: 50%

patterns: What is the selection criteria for Bachelors?
responses: Selection Crieria for Bachelors is as follows:- 50% weight to higher percent score of SSC (or an equivalent exam) OR HSSC (or an equivalent exam) and 50% weight to marks obtained in Admission Test.

patterns: What is the eligibilty criteria for ms?
responses: Selection Criteria of Master is as follows:- Past Academic Record (Bachelor): 50% and Performance in NU subject Admission Test: 50%

patterns: What is the eligibilty criteria for Masters?
responses: Eligibility Criteria of MS is as follows:-  Degree in relevant subject earned after 16 years of education from an HEC recognized university and At least 60% marks or CGPA of at least 2.0 (on a scale of 4.0) and Two years of post qualification experience in software development or related area.

patterns: What is the eligibilty criteria for bba?
responses: Eligibility Criteria of BBA is as follows:- At least 60% marks in SSC (Matric) or an equivalent examination (such as O-levels) and should have studied for HSSC or an equivalent qualification, for at least two years and At least 60% marks in the Pre-Engineering or an equivalent examination

patterns: What is the eligibilty criteria for bachelors in business administration?
responses: Eligibility Criteria of Bachelors in Business Administration is as follows:- At least 60% marks in SSC (Matric) or an equivalent examination (such as O-levels) and should have studied for HSSC or an equivalent qualification, for at least two years and At least 60% marks in the Pre-Engineering or an equivalent examination

responses: Eligibility Criteria of Engineering is as follows:- At least 60% marks in SSC (Matric) or an equivalent examination (such as O-levels) and should have studied for HSSC or an equivalent qualification, for at least two years and At least 60% marks in the Pre-Engineering or an equivalent examination

patterns: I am a foreign national can I apply in FAST?
responses: Yes you can apply in fast if you're a foreign national. You must submit an NOC from the Ministry of Education.

patterns: what is admit card? Do I need the admit card to appear in the exam?
responses: Admit Card is the verification that you are an eligible candidate. You must carry it with you on the dat of admission test.

patterns: Is admission application fee refundable?
responses: The application admission fee is non-refundable.

patterns: What is application challan?
Where can I submit my application admission fee?
responses: Application Challan is generated on admission portal after you have complete your registration. You can pay the challan at any branch of Faysal Bank.

patterns: what is arn?
Do I need arn?
responses: The online system assigns a unique Application Reference Number (ARN) to each applicant, which must be noted for later use.

patterns: can I mail my application through mail or tcs?
responses: No, only online applications through Fast Admission Portal are accepted.

patterns: what is the pattern of phd admission test?
responses: The PhD admission test contains 100 MCQ's from programming, automata, operating systems,database, oop artificial intelligence and algorithms domain plus 30% weghtage is for Essay Writing.

patterns: Where can I found old admission tests?
responses: You can find old admission test sample papers on our webiste as well as on the internet.

patterns: what is the pattern of ms admission test? Describe masters admission test pattern? Tell me about ms admission test pattern?
responses: MS Program test pattern is as follows:- Essay Writing 10%, Analytical Skills and IQ 30%,Specialization Area 30%,Quantitative Methods 30%.

intents.tag: master of business administration admission test pattern
patterns: what is the pattern of mba admission test? Describe master in business administration admission test pattern? Tell me about ms admission test pattern?
responses: MBA test pattern is as follows:- English 10%, Analytical Skills and IQ 20%,Essay Writing 30%,Quantitaive Methods 20%,Business Related Knowledge 20%.

patterns: what is the pattern of mba admission test? Describe master in business administration admission test pattern? Tell me about ms admission test pattern?
responses: MBA test pattern is as follows:- English 10%, Analytical Skills and IQ 20%,Essay Writing 30%,Quantitaive Methods 20%,Business Related Knowledge 20%.

patterns: what is the pattern of electrical engineering admission test? Describe ee admission test pattern? Tell me about ee admission test pattern?
responses: CS and Engineering Admission test pattern is as follows:- English 10%, Analytical Skills and IQ 20%,Basic Math 20%,Advance Math 50%.

patterns: what is the pattern of cs admission test? Describe computer science admission test pattern? Tell me about cs admission test pattern?
responses: CS and Engineering Admission test pattern is as follows:- English 10%, Analytical Skills and IQ 20%,Basic Math 20%,Advance Math 50%.

patterns: what is the pattern of bba admission test? Describe bachelors of business  admission test pattern? Tell me about ee admission test pattern?
responses: BBA and BS Admission test pattern is as follows:- English 10%, Analytical Skills and IQ 25%,Essay Writing 15%,Basic Math 50%.

intents.tag: bachelors of business administration test pattern
patterns: what is the pattern of bba admission test? Describe bachelors of business  admission test pattern? Tell me about ee admission test pattern?
responses: BBA and BS Admission test pattern is as follows:- English 10%, Analytical Skills and IQ 25%,Essay Writing 15%,Basic Math 50%.

patterns: what is the pattern of electrical engineering admission test? Describe ee admission test pattern? Tell me about ee admission test pattern?
responses: CS and Engineering Admission test pattern is as follows:- English 10%, Analytical Skills and IQ 20%,Basic Math 20%,Advance Math 50%.

patterns: what is the pattern of cs admission test? Describe computer science admission test pattern? Tell me about cs admission test pattern?
responses: CS and Engineering Admission test pattern is as follows:- English 10%, Analytical Skills and IQ 20%,Basic Math 20%,Advance Math 50%.

patterns: what is the composition of admission test?, What is the percentage of each subject in admission test, what subjects are included in the admission test?, What is the test pattern of fast admission test?
responses: The pattern for admission test vary by each program.

patterns: How many times can I give admission test?
responses: You can give 1 admission test in an academic year

patterns: How much score do I need in FAST Admission test?
responses: There is no bar set for the score in Fast Admission Test. You just need to appear on the merit.

patterns: How much marks do I need in FSc to secure a seat in Fast?
responses: As per HEC Policy you need to secure at least 60% marks in FSc.

patterns: How can I secure a seat in Fast Faisalabad?
responses: You need to secure a seat by appearing on the merit. Merit changes every year

patterns: What was the previous merit of Fast Faisalabad?
responses: As per our policy we don’t disclose the closing merit.

patterns: I applied in FAST Islamabad, Can I get an admission in FAST Faisalabad?
responses: Yes you can still get admission in Faisalabad, Contact our admission office immediately as the number of seats are limited.

patterns: I applied in FAST Lahore, Can I get an admission in FAST Faisalabad?
responses: Yes you can still get admission in Faisalabad, Contact our admission office immediately as the number of seats are limited.

intents.tag: did not apply in fast faisalabad
patterns: I did not apply in FAST Faisalabad, Can I still get an admission?
responses: Yes you can still get admission in Faislabad, If there are seats available. If you want to get an admission contact our admission office immediately.

patterns: Can I transfer my seat from any other campus to Faisalabad?
responses: Yes you can transfer your program and credit hours from any other campus to Faisalabad by completing the requirements.

patterns: What is Daira?
responses: Daira is our annual olympiad which is held annually in March. Autoshow, Pet Show, Theatre and skill tests every competition category is included in Daira.

patterns: Does fast hold cricket league?
responses: Yes we have a special tournamel called FAST Cricket League. Bidding is done to own the best teams. Winner is rewarded with a hefty amount.

patterns: what recreational activities are avialbale at fast?
responses: Fast has a variety of recreational activities. Daira our Annual Olympiad is held each year in March which attracts audience and participants from all across the country.

patterns: what type of sports activities are available in fast?
responses: Fast Faisalabad has a variety of sports activities. Our sports society organizes Fast Premiere Football Leagues, Night Crciket Leagues as well as table tennis, badminton and fusball tournaments each semester.

patterns: What is Fast Primere League?
responses: FAST premiere league is our premiere foorball league which is held each semester.

patterns: Are the classes airconditioned?
Are there air conditioners available in classrooms?
Is the campus centrally air conditioned?
responses: Yes, air conditioners are available in every classroom and every other facility within the campus.

patterns: Are rooms at hostel air conditioned?
responses: No, hostel rooms are not air conditioned.

patterns: Can hostelites use library after 5pm
Does hostel has library?
responses: Yes, hostelites can use the library after 5pm during mids and before finals.

patterns: Is microwave available at hostel?
responses: Yes, microwave is available at hostel?

patterns: Is refrigerator available at hostel?
Can students use refrigerator at hostel?
responses: Yes, refrigerator is available at hostel and students can use it.

patterns: What is the hostel mess schedule?
responses: Hostel mess schedule is changed monthly. Every new schedule is mailed to the students monthly.

patterns: Can I pay me hostel fee in installments?
Is installment option available for hostel fee submission?
responses: Under special cases, hostel fee can also be submitted in installments. You have to submit a General Request Form stating the reason and get it approved by the administration and submit it to the accounts office.

patterns: what is the maximum and minimum duration of bs cs
what is the maximum and minimum duration of bs ee
what is the maximum and minimum duration of bbs
responses: As mandated by HEC, BS Programs have a duration of 4 Years in FAST.

patterns: What is fast disciplinary committee?
what id dc in fast
what is dc?
responses: DC stands for disciplinary committee in FAST which ensures that the student code of conduct is being followed properly.

patterns: how is cgpa calculated?
responses: CGPA is calculated on the basis of grades, each grade carries a fixed score out of a total score of 4.They are combined together at the end of the semester to calculate cgpa.

patterns: What is CGPA?
What is gpa?
responses: Cumulative Grade point average (CGPA) is your academic performance tracker throughout your degree just like a score card in school.

patterns: What happens if I fail a course
What happens if I cannot pass a course?
responses: If you fail a course you have to repeat the course in the next semester.

patterns: how many installments can be done for tuition fee?
responses: Generally 2 installments are done for the fee, but you can request for more in the form

patterns: can I pay my fee in installments?
Is fee installment option available?
Do I have to pay all the tuition fee at once?
responses: Yes you can pay your fee in installments to do that you have to submit a general request form to the committe stating your reason and get it approved by the committee head and then finally submit it to the accounts office.
